advancement.rlm.root.title: Cobblemon RLM
advancement.rlm.flammikite.title: It's over Anakin, I Have a Flammikite!
advancement.rlm.catch_rlm.title: One of the Chosen of the Otter-Sea Kingdom
advancement.rlm.catch_rlm_shiny.title: That's IMPOSSIBLE!
advancement.rlm.catch_rlm_shiny.desc: Obtain a Shiny RLM regional form.
advancement.rlm.catch_sunflora_forms.des: Capture and gather the 3 forms of RLM Sunflora (Sky, Ocean, Volcano).
advancement.rlm.evolve_shedinja_rlm.desc: Obtain an RLM Shedinja resulting from the evolution of an RLM Nincada.
advancement.rlm.catch_rlm_starter.title: A New Beginning
advancement.rlm.catch_rlm_starter.desc: Welcome one of the regional starters to your team (RLM Chikorita, Squirtle, Fennekin, or Piplup).
advancement.rlm.ascension_rlm.title: RLM Ascension
advancement.rlm.ascension_rlm.desc: Obtain the final evolved form of an RLM regional Pokémon.
advancement.rlm.full_rlm_party.title: Collector of Wonders
advancement.rlm.full_rlm_party.desc: Form a full party (6) composed entirely of RLM Pokémon.
